data.text: @AnthonyMMilos @PerezHilton @Patriots I don't think it's weird at all. Evan kisses me on the lips. People need to stop making everything weird.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Fuck all you haters.  I am from a Southern European Family.  This is not wierd.

@PerezHilton @Patriots That kiss is not weird at all that is a father showing affecting to his child. That is how we all learn to love and show others is through how we experience our first loves.... our parents. The prob is there is too little affection everywhere else.

@PerezHilton @Patriots But the Tom whines like he was whining to his gf or wife and says “That was like ... a peck” makes his son whine and then they kiss again but for like way too long all the while tommy boy is getting a massage...🤦🏾‍♀️

@PerezHilton @Patriots The mans son came in and asked about doing something for his fantasy league then Tom said “well what do I get” his son kissed him on the lips. Cool fine whatever there’s nothing wrong up to this point I guess

@PerezHilton @Patriots I’m very confused why I see comments saying omg it’s just a kiss or omg how dare he kiss him on the lips as if that’s the main problem. I feel like  a huge percentage of people didn’t watch the video to see what was actually the issue....

@Aineyy @PerezHilton @Patriots It’s not the fact that he kissed him on the lips y’all its the fact that when his son gave him the kiss he whined about it and then made his son kiss him for a period of time that was uuhh Just too long
@cmarie_therrien @PerezHilton @Patriots A peck, quick kiss is something else. A long kiss like that is just weird.
@PerezHilton @Patriots More than a little creepy!
@PerezHilton @Patriots What is our business?! That's his father not the neighbor! Get your mind out the gutter!!
@PerezHilton @Patriots Leave Tom alone on this one
@PerezHilton @Patriots He’s a daddy. It’s normal America. It’s 2018.

@PerezHilton @Patriots I do not like Tom Brady, that said I commend him for not being afraid to show his son that he loves him. I don’t think there is anything wrong with kissing your kids on the lips. Unless they are 18 and tongue is involved. 😂
@PerezHilton @Patriots Their business and as we have seen ppl do wayyyyyy worse things to children
@PerezHilton @Patriots Omg it’s a picture it’s fine
@PerezHilton @Patriots Who cares it’s his son! We have bigger things to worry about
@PerezHilton @Patriots The people who are uncomfortable by this is because they are sick in the head
@PerezHilton @Patriots What’s the big deal. In spanish countries parents do this all the time. Giselle is Brazilian and it’s probably a culture thing.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Give me a break
@PerezHilton @Patriots OMG! R u kidding me? People should mind their own business stop people! Just stop the nonsense already!
@PerezHilton @Patriots What the F is wrong with people??! That’s where I stand
@PerezHilton @Patriots  https://t.co/KpJPwNf0xr
@PerezHilton @Patriots Kiss kiss kiss & more kisses for children 👶🏼 https://t.co/UEAGxNuGJA
@PerezHilton @Patriots #whitepeople
@PerezHilton @Patriots I say that we have so many other issues to worry about than this sweet relationship. Move on.
@ltzig @PerezHilton @Patriots Agreed! My siblings and me still kiss our mum on the lips (we’re 16-24) and I see no problem with this! So let him alone!  #theworldhasbiggerproblems
@ltzig @PerezHilton @Patriots I have always kissed my children on the lips also.
@PerezHilton @JulesVidro @Patriots I agree.
@PerezHilton ~ as someone who received little to no physical affection, i find it strange… but my perspective may be skewed a smidge.
@PerezHilton @Patriots STAHP IT! STOP critiquing parents for being loving. STOP IT! STOP the constant parental police! I CAN'T!
@PerezHilton @Patriots There are issues where people need to mind their own damn business I kiss my children on the lips and so did their father . I have healthy adults .
@PerezHilton @Patriots what is considered too long on the lips?
@PerezHilton @Patriots It's nobody's freaking business.. he is a loving parent,critics are dirty mind people
@PerezHilton @Patriots To each their own. But I have never kissed my son on the lips.

@PerezHilton @Patriots So disgusting that people try to make this into anything more than a loving father and son showing affection! Also sick of when people are successful online trolls try to tear them down #TomBrady supporter!
@PerezHilton @Patriots I see nothing wrong!! I’m sure he loves his son with all his heart and soul.
@PerezHilton @Patriots I must admit a man kissing his "elderly" son on the lips is somewhat inappropriate. No parent or family of mine ever did kiss a child on the lips.
@PerezHilton @Patriots To each their own,but I personally wouldn’t kiss my kids on the lips.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Not my monkeys; not my circus.
@PerezHilton @Patriots It’s no ones business!! He loves his kids! Better than a horrible abusive father, right?! We should celebrate good father’s not criticize them!
@PerezHilton @Patriots I think people need to get a damn life . This is  not creepy or gross in any way, shape or form. This is just a dad who loves his son period. Dont make it something it's not.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Agreed
@PerezHilton @Patriots That's his kid, everyone just need to stop making issues out of everything!!
@JulesVidro @Patriots Much ado about nothing.
@PerezHilton @Patriots What’s your take Perez ?
@PerezHilton @Patriots Love between a parent and child is special. It's none of anyone's business
@PerezHilton @Patriots My son always does this to me, accompanied by a long “mmmmmmmmmwah” ... I don’t see anything wrong with it ... it’s harmless
@PerezHilton @Patriots Ridiculous !!!
@PerezHilton @Patriots People need to chill not everything needs to be criticized. #TomBrady and his family can show affection in anyway they want
@PerezHilton @Patriots No issues at all. There is nothing wrong with it whatsoever! It is his child. Anyone who has a problem with this seriously needs to sit down

@PerezHilton @Patriots As I said on Facebook, people need to shut their judgmental little faces up. At least he’s raising his kids. I know plenty of Father’s who aren’t. And people are jumping on him for kissing his child? Wow, just wow.
@PerezHilton @Patriots What a child loved by his father, how dare he!!!! Live you own damn lives, he is a great dad!
@PerezHilton @Patriots Toxic masculinity says that showing love and affection to your son is somehow “wrong.” I’m sure kisses from Daddy were the reason for all of these school shootings, right 🙄

@PerezHilton @Patriots He is a loving father showing his boy affection, there is nothing wrong with this!! People who are bothered by this need some introspection!!! He is not being inappropriate one bit, the public sucks so bad. #GOAT
@PerezHilton @Patriots That’s iffy!!🤨
@PerezHilton @Patriots This is exactly why he keeps his life private. Insane.

@MeritaAppleHead @PerezHilton @Patriots It’s the length of the kiss that’s the problem and how he acted toward his kid pecking him.  That’s the issue.  Grown men or woman shouldn’t have a lengthy kiss like that with there kids and complain about the length of the kiss.   That is disgusting
@ShredzArmy23 @Patriots LOL!
@PerezHilton @Patriots The problem is the kiss is way to long and for a grown man to complain about how long his kid kissed him is wrong and disturbing

@PerezHilton @Patriots 🙄 where I stand on MOST issues, mind your fuckin business people! This is why although most times I want to reach thru the speakers and put my hands on @ChrisBooker I appreciate that he's not judgmental, the world needs less of that and more acceptance
@PerezHilton @Patriots I’m just jealous this kid might be kissing Gisele
@PerezHilton @Patriots People are nuts who cares what they think
@PerezHilton @Patriots I would rather this than a player that hasn’t 15 kids to 9 different moms and spends more time counting money than with his kids.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Seriously???  Good God.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Omg seriously?!? It's his child, get over it! https://t.co/osoqjfOdWA
@PerezHilton @Patriots Stoooooop iiiiiit!!!!!! Let the man kiss his kid!! A father/son moment, nothing more🙄🙄 Move along trolls.....
@PerezHilton @Patriots I'm 33 and I have always greeted or said goodbye to my parents with a kiss on the mouth. The people who find it inappropriate are the creepy ones for even taking it there.

@PerezHilton @Patriots Reminds me of that BS time @PerezHilton was criticized for bathing with his kids. BS good father love their children the right way and children love their parents back the right way.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Not really sure why I ever followed you in the first place. But this “issue” has sealed the deal. You’re an idiot. Unfollow. Bye.
@PerezHilton @Patriots Is this a joke🙄
@PerezHilton @Patriots Only people who are prevented, wanna sexualize everything have a problem they need to grow and get a life
@PerezHilton @Patriots parents can't even show affections towards they're kids nowadays 🙄

@PerezHilton @Patriots Why is this an issue? It's his own son. His son came from him. Let them show love how they want. I have 2 boys and I kiss them on the lips all the time. Stop sexualizing everything!!
@PerezHilton @Patriots @ThePerezHilton 😒come on. Dad? Mom? Give me a break. What is wrong with people?! 🙄 #trolls
@PerezHilton @Patriots Those are his kids. Let him live
@PerezHilton @Patriots What issue?
@PerezHilton @Patriots that’s just stupid. You can never kiss your kids too long unless you have mental ... https://t.co/Fwd0KGAG3q
@PerezHilton @Patriots Who cares!
@PerezHilton @Patriots I think part of the issue is that @PerezHilton is even talking and posting about it. You don’t like ppl criticizing you for bathing with your kids. Double standard maybe??

@PerezHilton @Patriots First off the kid is leaning in,  and he obviously has no idea or concern on how long you should kiss for, his not gonna push the kid away and be like "ewww too long" cause then fuckers are gonna be like "oh you pushed your own kid away"...  You can't win!!!!!!!
@PerezHilton @Patriots Clearly neither one of them are uncomfortable, it’s how they show affection in their family, and it’s no one’s business HOW PEOPLE CHOOSE TO LOVE!!! 🤔🤔🤔
@PerezHilton @Patriots Please... this is ridiculous 🤦🏽‍♀️
@PerezHilton @Patriots Dirty minded people making something dirty out of a loving moment between father and son
@PerezHilton @Patriots This was funny. If you watched this episode the kid walks away wiping his mouth off. There is also an episode where he kisses his daughter. So what?
@PerezHilton @Patriots I kiss my son for ages... no problem with it...

@PerezHilton @Patriots I remember David beckham getting the same criticism for kissing his kids on the lips, they're fathers who love their children!!! I kiss my kids on the lips nothing wrong with it
@PerezHilton @Patriots Really..... this is a thing?.... are we serious
@PerezHilton @Patriots Oh brother!😩 ppl just stop!!
@PerezHilton @Patriots I'm from the Caribbean, we kiss our kids on the lips, nothing wrong with that!
@PerezHilton @Patriots  https://t.co/pemEvyhbD3
@PerezHilton @Patriots God! america is so puritan ...
@PerezHilton @Patriots People need 2 get a LIFE!!  We luv our #TomBrady
@PerezHilton @Patriots They find way to much shit to complain about. Had he been a deadbeat father they’d be talking about that too. Keep raising your kids right TB12.
@PerezHilton @Patriots I think this is ridiculous that's it's even a thing. He would be tagged as a bad dad if he didn't show his son love.
